body_html:
Hello again, updates on my issue.
I recompiled tensorflow with the exact same settings but with python 3.5 from Ubuntu repositories and everything work fine.
After some examination of source code, i find out that
on python 3.5
sys.getsizeof(type) == 400
but on my python 3.6
sys.getsizeof(type) == 416
and because of that _EagerTensorBase was bigger then expected.
And looks like this was the cause of issue

body:
Hello again, updates on my issue.
I recompiled tensorflow with the exact same settings but with python 3.5 from Ubuntu repositories and everything work fine. 
After some examination of source code, i find out that 
on python 3.5
`sys.getsizeof(type) == 400`
but on my python 3.6 
`sys.getsizeof(type) == 416`
and because of that `_EagerTensorBase` was bigger then expected.
And looks like this was the cause of issue
